item.title: Johnnie Ray - Just Walking In The Rain
item.description:
Just walking
in the rain
Getting
soaking wet
Torturing my heart
by trying to forget
Just walking
in the rain
So alone
and blue
All because my heart
still remembers you
People come to
their windows
They always
stare at me
Shaking their heads
in sorrow
Saying who can
that fool be
Just walking
in the rain
Thinking
how we met
And knowing
things have changed
Somehow
I can’t forget-

People come to
their windows
They always
stare at me
Shaking their heads
in sorrow
Saying who can
that fool be
Just walking
in the rain
Thinking
how we met
Knowing
things have changed
Somehow
I can’t forget-
